Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is slightly ribbed and partially covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and traces of red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394229) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394229)
